step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance.
Ensure your arm remains straight overhead as you begin the pumping motion.
Great job opening your palm and fingers wide. Relax your muscles as you exhale.
Excellent! You made a good fist while inhaling and tightening your muscles. Keep visualizing the fluid flow.
Second rep starting! Remember to keep that arm straight overhead and feel the stretch.
Continue to maintain the overhead arm position throughout the movement.
Nicely done opening your hand wide and relaxing. Focus on the exhale.
Fantastic! You made a strong fist while inhaling. Keep up the great work visualizing the lymph flow.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and feel the resistance. Open your hand wide while exhaling and make a fist while inhaling, tightening your muscles. Keep visualizing the fluid being pumped out.
